p: Additional primers used in this study were N1280 ( 5′- AGTCAGTTCTAATCATCAAGC-3′), M138( 5′-AAGTTCCTYATGTTYTTCTTGC-3′), G( 5′GACTTGGGTCTCCCGAACTGGGG-3′) and L ( 5′-CAA AGG AGA GTT GAG ATT GTA GTC-3′), at positions 1348–1368, 2632–2653, 4666–4688 and 5512–5535, respectively, of the lyssavirus genome [37].
